revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|brand = Thecus |model = N4350 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v0.2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/14/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Thecus_N4350 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6828;Armada 388; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U4G8F2DTR-BC; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = NOR |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L3206EM2I-12G; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5AN4G6NAFR-UHC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1512; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = BC:5C:4C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.01;Marvell v.2015 T1.0p18; |stockos = ThecusOS 7.0;;;
|exp_if_types = SATA 3.0, USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 4 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2 |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, buzzer, fan, heatsink, metal case, power switch |addchip = USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, 512Kb SPI NOR Flash;Macronix;MX25L512EMI-10G;;1;,,, 16-bit I2C-bus LED dimmer;Phillips;PCA9532PW;;1;,,, Digital Temperature Sensor and Thermal Watchdog;TI;LM75B;;1;,,, 5A, 18V, 650kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;RIchtek;RT6206A;;2;,,, Precision Programmable Reference;TI;TL431;;1;,,, 2-Channel SPDT Bidirectional Analog Switch Dual-Channel 2:1 Multiplexer and Demultiplexer;TI;TS3A24159;;1;,,, Single Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop w/Clear and Preset;TI;SN74LVC1G74;;1;,,, 3A, 50V PNP Low VCEsat Transistor;Nexperia;PBSS5350Z;;1;,,, 2A, 20V PNP Medium Power Transistor;Nexperia;BCP69;;1;,,, 30V, 35A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AON7401;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2017 |estprice = 270 |upc = 884956004035 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 2WG-00G6-00001 |asin = B071XCTJ3V |asin_country = AE |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "N4350_MB Ver:0.2" is silkscreened on the board. :OUI: BC:5C:4C ([[Elecom]])
{{See also|List of NAS Devices}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6828 (''Armada 388'') :Dual Core ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.8GHz *Storage: 4MB (SPI NOR), 512MB (NAND) Flash, 4x SATA *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (internal only), 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power: 12V/5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/thecus-n4350-four-bay-soho-nas-reviewed/ ''Thecus N4350 Four-Bay SOHO NAS Reviewed'' on '''StorageReview'''] *[https://www.kitguru.net/professional/networking/simon-crisp/thecus-n4350-4-bay-nas/all/1/ ''Thecus N4350 4-Bay NAS'' on '''KitGuru''']
